snippet: An insider trading investigation involves some big names. | The inquiry could complicate Carl Icahn’s legacy. | Valeant has again raised its bid for Allergan. | Mexico has authorized arrests of former executives at Citigroup’s Mexican subsidiary.
abstract: An insider trading investigation involves some big names. | The inquiry could complicate Carl Icahn’s legacy. | Valeant has again raised its bid for Allergan. | Mexico has authorized arrests of former executives at Citigroup’s Mexican subsidiary.

headline.main: Morning Agenda: Big Names in Insider Trading Case
